subject: Citizenship and Naturalization
Short-Track Speedskating
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The speedskating star Ahn Hyun-soo chose Russia over the United States and changed his name to Viktor after switching allegiance from South Korea in 2011.
snippet: The speedskating star Ahn Hyun-soo chose Russia over the United States and changed his name to Viktor after switching allegiance from South Korea in 2011.
